name: University of San Francisco - School of Law
description: University of San Francisco, School of Law provides student led clinics for: - Criminal & Juvenile Justice - Immigration & Deportation Defense - Immigration Policy - International Human Rights - Internet & Intellectual Property Justice - Racial Justice All clinics are supervised by faculty who are licensed to practice law.
